Text: for those unfamiliar with vob files, you need to create an empty folder titled AUDIO_TS to go with the VIDEO_TS file you are downloading. The burn both the VIDEO_TS and the empty AUDIO_TS on to a dvd using whatever program you like. enjoy film. Sorry this is my first torrent upload and I couldn't figure out how to upload an empty folder or i would have done it for you.

burn with Nero by creating a new DVD-Video. Place all the files in the video_ts of the empty disc and burn. It's the easiest way to burn vob files.
